Mortal Kombat is a fighting game in which players battle opponents in one-on-one matches.
Naruto is a ninja-in-training whose wild antics amuse his teammates. But he's completely serious about one thing: becoming the world's greatest ninja!
Pac-Man is an action maze chase video game; the player controls the eponymous character through an enclosed maze.
